dbms.util
Class Table

java.lang.Object
  dbms.util.Table
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Table
extends Object
implements Serializable

Describes the table as it is declared in our DBMS. It contains the name of the table, the columns that contain the fields and the primary key.

See Also:
